summary: Portugal is a country in Europe, located on the Iberian Peninsula. It's one of the oldest countries in Europe, established in 1143, and has a rich history. The Portuguese explored the world during the Age of Discovery, creating a large empire. Portugal's capital is Lisbon, and it's known for its beautiful landscapes, like the Algarve region. It has been through many political changes, from a monarchy to a republic, and is now a democratic country. Portugal is part of the European Union and is famous for its culture and language, with many people around the world speaking Portuguese.
title: Portugal
